title: Best of The Herd
itunes:title: Best of The Herd
description:
Colin criticizes the Steelers for sticking with Mitchell Trubisky at quarterback after another loss and not going with the rookie Kenny Pickett. He explains why the match up between the Packers and Buccaneers clearly means a lot more for Aaron Rodgers and his legacy compared to Tom Brady. He gives you his Blazing 5 picks for week 3 of the NFL season. Plus, former NFL LB Channing Crowder joins the show to convince Colin Tua Tagovailoa is the real deal. 

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
